v0.1.0
======

:Date: 2026-02-28 (Asia/Tokyo)

First **official** release.

Features
--------

* Implement features that I need them.

  * Add writer to generate Typst code and PDF with transforms.
  * Add translator with visitor and departure for some nodes.
  * Add CLI command ``rst2typst`` and ``rst2typstpdf``.

Others
------

* Write demo
* Write documents. it includes PDF of demo that is generated by ``rst2typstpdf``.

:Date: 2026-02-24 (Asia/Tokyo)

First release to use in localmachine by me.

I will note implements when it released after v0.0.1
